name: Holy Sailers
uniques: May buy [{Military} {Water}] units with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost <before the [Industrial era]>

name: Banishing Faith
uniques: When spreading religion to a city, gain [10] times the amount of followers of other religions as [Faith]

name: War Loving
uniques: [+1 Happiness, +1 Culture] from every [3] global followers [in enemy cities]

name: Cultural Love
uniques: Gain [50] [Culture] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>

name: Peace Gardens
uniques: [+2 Happiness] from every [Garden] <when not at war>
